name: Ritz Cracker Chicken
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts Dash of salt and pepper
steps: Preheat oven to 400°. Place crackers in a plastic bag and crush into crumbs. Place in a shallow bowl.
Add parmesan cheese and salt and pepper. Mix well. Melt butter in shallow bowl. Place chicken breasts
in a plastic bag, two at a time, and pound thin with meat pounder. Brush chicken with butter, then coat with
crumbs. Place on foil-­‐lined baking sheet, and bake 15 minutes.
